results.deck: Mortal Kombat: Armageddon is the seventh installment in the violent fighting game franchise, featuring the most complete Mortal Kombat roster to date.
results.name: Mortal Kombat: Armageddon

results.deck: NHL Hitz 20-02 is an arcade hockey game with an emphasis on fast, high-scoring, hard-hitting gameplay.
results.name: NHL Hitz 20-02

results.deck: In this quirky Japanese game, you must roll up anything and everything in your path to rebuild the cosmos after the King of All Cosmos destroys all the stars in the universe whilst on a bender.
results.name: Katamari Damacy

results.deck: The Suffering: Ties That Bind is a sequel of the action-oriented horror game; The Suffering.  It picks up the story immediately where the last one left of and features the same engine as the last game with improve graphics and gameplay elements.
results.name: The Suffering:  Ties That Bind

results.deck: An open-world brawler RPG developed by Cavia and published by Capcom.
results.name: Beat Down: Fists of Vengeance

results.deck: Madden 2004 introduced Playmaker Controls and owner mode to the Madden franchise.
results.name: Madden NFL 2004

results.deck: Taking place 20 years after Godzilla: Save the Earth, Godzilla returns to brawl in Godzilla: Unleashed.
results.name: Godzilla: Unleashed

results.deck: Eve of Extinction (EOE) is a 3D beat-â€™em-up
results.name: EOE: Eve of Extinction

results.deck: A PS2 launch title action RPG by From Software, the creators of the King's Field and Souls franchises.
results.name: Evergrace

results.deck: Formula One 05 continued to improve the gameplay mechanics and A.I over the previous Formula 1 games which was a step in the right direction after a number of lackluster Formula 1 games developed by Studio Liverpool.
results.name: Formula One 05

results.deck: Worms Forts: Under Siege is a turn based strategy game by Team 17 which worms must destroy the enemy team or their stronghold
results.name: Worms Forts: Under Siege

results.deck: .hack//Mutation continues the story of Kite trying to solve the mystery of his friend's coma through the fake MMO, The World.  It is the second game in the .hack franchise.
results.name: .hack//MUTATION - Part 2

results.deck: Sci-Fi comedy video game developed by Capcom where players take on the role of the alien Cosmi and learn mischief by going to Earth and causing mass panic.
results.name: Under the Skin

results.deck: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix lets the player control characters from the book and movie of the same name around a recreated Hogwarts castle, using magic and performing tasks along the way.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

results.deck: Tony Hawk's Project 8 was the first game in the Tony Hawk series built from the ground up for 7th generation of consoles. The game introduced the Nail-The-Trick mechanic and added graphical details like Bloom HDR lighting and ragdoll physics.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Project 8

results.deck: Released on July 14, 2003.  Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004 is the first Tiger Woods game to feature the Gameface (create a player) feature, as well as online play for the PS2 edition.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004

results.deck: Star Ocean: Till the End of Time is the fourth game in the Star Ocean series. The game takes place 400 years after the third game, Star Ocean: Blue Sphere.
results.name: Star Ocean: Till the End of Time

results.deck: In Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance II, five new heroes battle through hordes of enemies and venture forth to rescue the protagonists of the first game.
results.name: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance II

results.deck: Mad Maestro is a rhythm game dealing specifically in classical music.
results.name: Mad Maestro!

results.deck: Astro Boy centers around a boy-robot named Astro that tries to bridge the relationship between humans and robots.
results.name: Astro Boy

results.deck: Street Basketball game licensed by AND 1 that most critics and players have agreed is mediocre.
results.name: AND 1 Streetball

results.deck: Fighters from multiple Street Fighter franchises, the Darkstalkers series, and Red Earth all battle out (with their own fighting game systems) in this 2D fighting game crossover.
results.name: Capcom Fighting Evolution

results.deck: Pro Race Driver is a racing video game that puts the player in the shoes of Ryan McKane, a race driver trying to make a name for himself in numerous car championships.
results.name: Pro Race Driver

results.deck: The game continues straight after the movie with some Hulk smashing action and some stealth elements.
results.name: Hulk

results.deck: Stuntman: Ignition lets you live out the dream of getting paid to drive recklessly and with no concern for the law as you help film stunts for fictional movies.
results.name: Stuntman: Ignition

results.deck: NASCAR Thunder 2003 is a NASCAR game where you can ride around a track at high speeds, and create your own cars.
results.name: NASCAR Thunder 2003

results.deck: Sega Classics Collection is a compilation of 10 Sega Ages remakes of Sega classics.
results.name: Sega Classics Collection

results.deck: The sequel to the Geomod charged first-person shooter Red Faction, Red Faction II focuses on a military-driven storyline instead of the uprise of a lowly miner.
results.name: Red Faction II

results.deck: Spyro makes an amazing return as it tries to comeback from the disasters of the previous game.
results.name: Spyro: A Hero's Tail

results.deck: Final entry in the Guitar Hero series developed by Harmonix focusing specifically on the sounds of the 80's.
results.name: Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s

results.deck: Need for Speed Underground is considered to be one of the best NFS games, and one of the best selling ones, selling 15 million copies world wide.
results.name: Need for Speed Underground

results.deck: Play old school Sonic  with 20 titles to choose from including Sonic the hedgehog and Sonic 3D Flickies Island. Relive the memories in the best Sonic games to come from Sega.
results.name: Sonic Mega Collection Plus

results.deck: Delta Force: Black Hawk Down - Team Sabre is the sequel/expansion pack to Delta Force: Black Hawk Down, developed by Ritual Entertainment (PC) and Rebellion Studios (PS2)
results.name: Delta Force: Black Hawk Down - Team Sabre

results.deck: Shadow Hearts changes its setting from Europe and World War I to The United States of America's Great Depression without losing any of the RPG series' trademark combat system and bizarre sense of humor.
results.name: Shadow Hearts: From the New World

results.deck: The third outing for Sam Fisher finds him battling against terrorists who want to take control of the world using a simple algorithmic code.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory

results.deck: State of Emergency 2 is the sequel to 2002's State of Emergency, however this installment shares no similarities with the first game other than the name, and certain characters.
results.name: State of Emergency 2

results.deck: An arcade-style shooter that puts the player in control of a helicopter, with access to several weapon modes and the ability to cloak.
results.name: Fire Blade

results.deck: The follow-up to the 1998 blockbuster, Metal Gear Solid 2 blends tactical stealth and action. This sequel takes the action to an offshore oil cleanup facility seized by terrorists who are holding the President hostage. It helped sell the PS2, featuring advanced AI, physics and cover mechanics for its time, and one of the first postmodern narratives in gaming.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty

results.deck: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit 2 is the sequel to the 1998 blockbuster racing game, NFS III. Like its predecessor, it features high-speed police chases in exotic cars around a variety of locales around the world.
results.name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit 2

results.deck: SSX On Tour is the fourth game in the SSX franchise.
results.name: SSX on Tour

results.deck: The sequel to the original Space Harrier. It was also a launch title for the Mega Drive.
results.name: Space Harrier II

results.deck: A college basketball game from 2K Sports.
results.name: College Hoops 2K6

results.deck: Use an array of real-world firearms in this NRA-endorsed target shooting game.
results.name: NRA Gun Club

results.deck: The first official FIA licensed World Rally Chamionship game in the series for the PlayStation 2 using official drivers, cars and tracks from the 2001 season.
results.name: WRC World Rally Championship

results.deck: The Weakest Link is a console version of the TV show with the same name.
results.name: The Weakest Link

results.deck: A Pack of 3 light gun games.
results.name: Crime Fighter 3 Pack

results.deck: A role-playing game based around anime and manga Inuyasha.
results.name: Inuyasha: The Secret of the Cursed Mask

results.deck: WWE Smackdown vs. Raw 2008 is an iteration in the Smackdown vs Raw series. This version included Fighting Styles and a new struggle submission system as well as the ECW brand.
results.name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2008

results.deck: Fight a computer virus by hitting various switches.
results.name: Panic!

results.deck: The player took on the role of the main character from the movie Rodney Copperbottom. The GBA version should not be confused with the console versions which were heavily inspired by two excellent titles at the time, namely 'Jak and Daxter' and 'Ratchet and Clank'.
results.name: Robots

results.deck: Starring the demi-god Sphinx, and the undead corpse of Tutankhamen, this action-adventure game is filled with Ancient Egyptian mythology.
results.name: Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy

results.deck: One of the launch games for the PlayStation 2, TimeSplitters is a first-person shooter by Free Radical, praised for its fast-paced multiplayer action and sense of humor.
results.name: TimeSplitters
SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.24: Last Bronx - Tokyo Bangaichi

results.deck: An action/adventure role playing game from the developers behind Chronicles of Riddick and The Darkness. The game was never released outside Europe.
results.name: Knights of the Temple: Infernal Crusade

results.deck: A scuba-diving exploration adventure game developed by Arika for the Sony PS2. It is the sequel to Everblue and the spiritual predecessor to the Endless Ocean games.
results.name: Everblue 2

results.deck: Samanosuke returns to battle Nobunaga, but this time in present day Paris.
results.name: Onimusha 3: Demon Siege
World Championship Poker 2 featuring Howard Lederer

results.deck: Nicktoons Movin' is an mini-game collection that uses the EyeToy camera and features Nicktoons characters.
results.name: Nicktoons Movin'

results.deck: Formula One 2001 was released on the PlayStation and PlayStation 2.
results.name: Formula One 2001

results.deck: Darkwatch is an action packed Wild West FPS in which the player takes on the role of a cowboy who becomes cursed with vampiric powers.
results.name: Darkwatch

results.deck: Rule of Rose is a survival horror game set in 1930s England aboard an abandoned zeppelin. It is known for its controversial content, such as abusive violence and implied sexual themes towards its underage cast of characters.
results.name: Rule of Rose

results.deck: Drift your way to domination in the port of the arcade classic ported to the PS2.
results.name: Initial D: Special Stage

results.deck: Resident Evil: Survivor 2 - Code: Veronica is the second game in the Gun Survivor Series.  It is a light-gun game that was released in arcades, and on the PlayStation 2 in Japan and PAL regions only.
results.name: Resident Evil: Survivor 2 - Code: Veronica

results.deck: This game takes the four-man squad dynamic of the Conflict: Desert Storm games and transplants it into the setting of the Vietnam war.
results.name: Conflict: Vietnam

results.deck: Contains the original Puyo Puyo game, Puyo Puyo Tsu, and a number of variants (six in all). Part of the Sega Ages 2500 series for the PS2
results.name: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol. 12: Puyo Puyo Tsuu Perfect Set

results.deck: Wave Rally is a Jet Ski racing game for the PS2. An Xbox version was initially planned by eventually canceled.
results.name: Wave Rally

results.deck: Dropship: United Peace Force is a flight combat game released for the Playstation 2
results.name: Dropship: United Peace Force

results.deck: Fantastic Four is an action adventure game based on the 2005 film Fantastic Four. Players play as the characters of the Fantastic Four using combos and special attacks to fight their way through hordes of enemies and bosses.
results.name: Fantastic 4

results.deck: Rugby League 2 is a Rugby League Sports game created by Sidhe Interactive. It allows players to play as their favourite NRL or Super Leams in a variety of single player modes and in offline multiplayer.
results.name: Rugby League 2

results.deck: Sequel to Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon; part one of the Ghost Recon 2 "trilogy".
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2 - 2007: First Contact

results.deck: Gran Turismo 3: A-Spec is a driving simulator released for the Playstation 2 which garnered critical acclaim upon its release in 2001.
results.name: Gran Turismo 3 A-Spec

results.deck: A kart racing game featuring characters from various Cartoon Network original shows like Dexter's Laboratory, Powerpuff Girls & Johnny Bravo.
results.name: Cartoon Network Racing

results.deck: Mow down your opponents in this combat-racing game for the PlayStation 2.
results.name: Rumble Racing

results.deck: Cruise the streets of Rockport City, keep away from the cops, and defeat the wily Razor Callahan in this open-street racing game from EA Black Box.
results.name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted

results.deck: A action adventure game based around the classic Pixar movie, in which you help Sulley and Mike get Boo back to her world before the CDA catches up with you.
results.name: Disney/Pixar's Monsters Inc.

results.deck: Sven-GÃ¶ran Eriksson's World Manager is a soccer management game featuring Sven-GÃ¶ran Eriksson.
results.name: Sven-GÃ¶ran Eriksson's World Manager

results.deck: The 2005 release of EA Sport's Cricket franchise.
results.name: Cricket 2005

results.deck: NFL 2K5 continued the NFL 2K series with an improved presentation featuring ESPN personalities such as Chris Berman, Trey Wingo, and Suzy Kolber.
results.name: ESPN NFL 2K5
